name: AR Hover Pets
description: This is an Augmented Reality(AR) experience that gives you the controls of a quadcopter drone that you fly around in your physical environment. Just place your drone on the ground or floor and its time for takeoff. Accurate controls relative to your drone's orientation provide an realistic simulation to a real drone. However since this drone isn't real, we thought a cute animal pilot might add to the fun. Choose from up to ten Hover Pets to pilot your drone. This drone is fun to fly! Please be aware of your surroundings when using augmented reality.
